item.title: 据巴勒斯坦卫生当局称，在以色列军队向寻求食品援助的人群开火后，加沙至少有 104 人丧生，但以色列方面称，其中一些人是在争抢食品时丧生的。
item.description:
At least 104 people have been killed in Gaza after Israeli troops fired on crowds seeking food aid, according to Palestinian health authorities, but Israel has said some had died in a crush to reach the supplies https://t.co/BvZaNJDazB pic.twitter.com/7BgEUpyrtl

— Financial Times (@FT) February 29, 2024

item.title: 意见：我的工作曾带我到过许多战区，但我从未遇到过像加沙这样的情况。巴勒斯坦人流离失所、忍饥挨饿、走投无路。只有近东救济工程处才能帮助他们：必须让它履行职责
item.description:
Opinion: My work has taken me to many war zones, but I have never been confronted by anything like Gaza. Palestinians are displaced, starving and desperate. Only UNRWA can support them: it must be allowed to do its jobhttps://t.co/4SZcRfdBHH pic.twitter.com/DAZhfto0TX

— Financial Times (@FT) February 29, 2024

item.title: 我们最新的视觉故事解释了世界上最小的微芯片的制造过程，以及它们是如何由数十亿个比头发丝还小的晶体管驱动的！W/ @upyorkshire @Dan_Clark5 @samjoiner @BobHaslett @sam_learner 👉
item.description:
Our latest visual story explains the process of manufacturing the world's smallest microchips, and how they are powered by billions of transistors smaller than a hair!

W/ @upyorkshire @Dan_Clark5 @samjoiner @BobHaslett @sam_learner

item.title: 在今天与 @rbrtrmstrng 和 @EthanYWu 一起发布的 "无套利 "时事通讯中，达拉-科斯罗萨希为股票回购进行了非常有趣的辩护。
item.description:
Dara Khosrowshahi makes a very interesting defence of share buybacks in today's Unhedged newsletter with @rbrtrmstrng and @EthanYWu https://t.co/HsZFeyTInT

— Tony Tassell (@TonyTassell) February 28, 2024

item.title: 今年的选举没有思想，充满了没有政策的政治，关于价值观的激烈辩论却没有关于方向的辩论。对于那些毕生致力于思考如何更好地组织社会的人来说，这是一个苦涩、令人困惑的世界。
item.description:
This year's elections are without ideas, full of politics without policy and fierce debate over values but none over direction. It is a bitter, baffling world for those who have devoted their lives to thinking about how society might organise itself better https://t.co/c8wSdgjYqP

— FT Opinion (@ftopinion) February 28, 2024

item.title: 早上好，纽约。当你们还在睡觉时，我们关于泄露的俄罗斯军事档案的文章是阅读量最高的文章

— Financial Times (@FT) February 29, 2024

item.description:

Leaked war games written by Russian officers offer an extraordinary window into the army’s long-standing fears about Beijing’s real intentions https://t.co/FIpzDUSEcE pic.twitter.com/bxYRf9zEzd
